changeSet.sql: CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS error
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS error

column.name: id
column.remarks: The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the error report

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: The ID for the application that generated the error report

column.name: application_version
column.remarks: The version of the application that generated the error report

column.name: detail
column.remarks: The error detail e.g. a stack trace

column.name: created
column.remarks: The date and time the error report was created

column.name: who
column.remarks: The optional username for the user associated with the error report

column.name: device_id
column.remarks: The optional Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) for the device the error report originated from

column.name: feedback
column.remarks: The optional feedback provided by the user for the error

column.name: data
column.remarks: The optional base-64 encoded data associated with the error report
